definitions.definition: A brief extra performance, done after the main performance is complete.
definitions.example: Can I get an encore? We want more!

definitions.definition: A call or demand (as by continued applause) for a repeat performance.
To call for an extra performance or repetition of, or by.
definitions.example: to encore a performer; to encore a song

definitions.definition: (said by audience members after a performance) Please perform again!
